trans-unit.source: The QT_ENABLE_HIGHDPI_SCALING environment variable, introduced in Qt 5.14, enables automatic scaling based on the pixel density of the monitor. Replaces QT_AUTO_SCREEN_SCALE_FACTOR.

The QT_SCALE_FACTOR_ROUNDING_POLICY environment variable and QGuiApplication::highDpiScaleFactorRoundingPolicy API, introduced in Qt 5.14, makes it possible to control if and how the device pixel ratio should be rounded to the nearest integer. This is relevant for configurations like Windows at 150% scale. Possible values are Round, Ceil, Floor, RoundPreferFloor, PassThrough. See the Qt::HighDpiScaleFactorRoundingPolicy enum documentation for a full description of the options.

The QWebChannel fills the gap between C++ applications and HTML/JavaScript applications. By publishing a QObject derived object to a QWebChannel and using the qwebchannel.js on the HTML side, one can transparently access properties and public slots and methods of the QObject. No manual message passing and serialization of data is required, property updates and signal emission on the C++ side get automatically transmitted to the potentially remotely running HTML clients. On the client side, a JavaScript object will be created for any published C++ QObject. It mirrors the C++ object's API and thus is intuitively useable.

The QWebSocketCorsAuthenticator class is used in the originAuthenticationRequired() signal. The class provides a way to pass back the required information to the QWebSocketServer. It provides applications with fine-grained control over which origin URLs are allowed and which aren't. By default, every origin is accepted. To get fine-grained control, an application connects the originAuthenticationRequired() signal to a slot. When the origin (QWebSocketCorsAuthenticator::origin()) is accepted, it calls QWebSocketCorsAuthenticator::setAllowed(true)

The QXmlName class represents the name of an XML node, in an efficient, namespace-aware way. QXmlName represents the name of an XML node in a way that is both efficient and safe for comparing names. Normally, an XML node represents an XML element or attribute, but QXmlName can also represent the names of other kinds of nodes, e.g., QAbstractXmlReceiver::processingInstruction() and QAbstractXmlReceiver::namespaceBinding(). More...

The Q_NOREPLY macro can be used to mark a method to be called and not wait for it to finish processing before returning from QDBusInterface::call(). The called method cannot return any output arguments and, if it does, any such arguments will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Q_NOREPLY宏可用于标记要调用的方法，而无需等待它完成处理，然后再从QDBusInterface :: call（）返回。被调用的方法不能返回任何输出参数，如果返回，则任何此类参数都将被丢弃。

The Q_OBJECT macro must appear in the private section of a class definition that declares its own signals and slots or that uses other services provided by Qt's meta-object system.

trans-unit.source: The Q_SCXML_DATAMODEL has to appear in the private section of the class definition, for example right after the opening bracket, or after a Q_OBJECT macro. This macro expands to the declaration of some virtual methods whose implementation is generated by the Qt SCXML compiler.

trans-unit.source: The Qt SQLite 2 plugin is offered for compatibility. Whenever possible, use the version 3 plugin instead. The build instructions for version 3 apply to version 2 as well.
trans-unit.target: 提供Qt SQLite 2插件是为了实现兼容性。尽可能使用版本3插件代替。版本3的构建说明也适用于版本2。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SQLite plugin makes it possible to access SQLite databases. SQLite is an in-process database, which means that it is not necessary to have a database server. SQLite operates on a single file, which must be set as the database name when opening a connection. If the file does not exist, SQLite will try to create it. SQLite also supports in-memory and temporary databases. Simply pass respectively ":memory:" or an empty string as the database name.
trans-unit.target: Qt SQLite插件使访问SQLite数据库成为可能。SQLite是一个进程内数据库，这意味着不需要数据库服务器。SQLite对单个文件进行操作，打开连接时必须将其设置为数据库名称。如果文件不存在，SQLite将尝试创建它。SQLite还支持内存和临时数据库。只需分别传递“：memory：”或一个空字符串作为数据库名称。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SQLite 2 plugin is offered for compatibility. Whenever possible, use the version 3 plugin instead. The build instructions for version 3 apply to version 2 as well.

The Qt SQLite plugin makes it possible to access SQLite databases. SQLite is an in-process database, which means that it is not necessary to have a database server. SQLite operates on a single file, which must be set as the database name when opening a connection. If the file does not exist, SQLite will try to create it. SQLite also supports in-memory and temporary databases. Simply pass respectively ":memory:" or an empty string as the database name.

The Qt Meta-Object System in Qt is responsible for the signals and slots inter-object communication mechanism, runtime type information, and the Qt property system. A single QMetaObject instance is created for each QObject subclass that is used in an application, and this instance stores all the meta-information for the QObject subclass. This object is available as QObject::metaObject().

The Qt Meta-Object System in Qt is responsible for the signals and slots inter-object communication mechanism, runtime type information, and the Qt property system. A single QMetaObject instance is created for each QObject subclass that is used in an application, and this instance stores all the meta-information for the QObject subclass. This object is available as QObject::metaObject().
trans-unit.target: Qt中的Qt 元对象系统负责信号和插槽对象间的通信机制，运行时类型信息以及Qt属性系统。为应用程序中使用的每个QObject子类创建一个QMetaObject实例，该实例存储QObject子类的所有元信息。该对象可以作为QObject :: metaObject（）使用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Bluetooth module's APIs allows access to Bluetooth-enabled devices. There are APIs for scanning Bluetooth devices and sharing data among devices. The APIs have support for radio-frequency communication (RFCOMM) and OBEX Object Push Profile (OPP) protocols.

The Qt Creator IDE can be used to develop Qt applications for Android. For more information, see Qt Creator: Connecting Android Devices.

The Qt Creator IDE is the key tool that enhances the overall developer experience of working with Qt Quick. Its auto-completion and debugging features make working with Qt Quick easier. Besides this, most of the tools and utilities mentioned in the earlier sections are integrated into it, with the possibility of integrating 3rd party tools such as QmlLive and GammaRay.
trans-unit.target: Qt Creator IDE是关键工具，可增强使用Qt Quick的整体开发人员体验。它的自动完成和调试功能使Qt Quick的使用更加轻松。除此之外，前面部分提到的大多数工具和实用程序都已集成到其中，并且可以集成第三方工具（例如QmlLive和GammaRay）。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Creator IDE that came with the Qt 5 installation on your development host, must be configured to enable developing applications for Android. Launch Qt Creator and select Tools > Options > Devices > Android to add the Android NDK and SDK paths. For more details, refer to Qt Creator Manual.
trans-unit.target: 必须将开发主机上Qt 5安装附带的Qt Creator IDE配置为启用Android开发应用程序。启动Qt Creator，然后选择“ 工具” >“ 选项” >“ 设备” >“ Android”以添加Android NDK和SDK路径。有关更多详细信息，请参阅Qt Creator手册。

trans-unit.source: The Qt D-Bus XML compiler is a tool that can be used to parse interface descriptions and produce static code representing those interfaces, which can then be used to make calls to remote objects or implement said interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Qt D-Bus XML编译器是一个工具,它可以用来解析接口描述,并生成代表这些接口的静态代码,然后可以用来对远程对象进行调用或实现所述接口。

trans-unit.source: The Qt D-Bus module fully encapsulates the low-level concept of messages into a simpler, object-oriented approach familiar to Qt developers. In most cases, the developer need not worry about sending or receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: Qt D-Bus模块将消息的低级概念完全封装成Qt开发者熟悉的更简单的面向对象的方法。在大多数情况下,开发者无需担心消息的发送或接收。

trans-unit.source: The Qt D-Bus module is available under commercial licenses from The Qt Company. In addition, it is available under free software licenses. Since Qt 5.4, these free software licenses are GNU Lesser General Public License, version 3, or the GNU General Public License, version 2. See Qt Licensing for further details.
trans-unit.target: Qt D-Bus模块可从Qt Company获得商业许可。此外，它可在免费软件许可下获得。从Qt 5.4开始，这些免费软件许可证为GNU通用公共许可证版本3或GNU通用公共许可证版本2。有关更多详细信息，请参见Qt许可。

The Qt DB2 plugin makes it possible to access IBM DB2 databases. It has been tested with IBM DB2 v7.1 and 7.2. You must install the IBM DB2 development client library, which contains the header and library files necessary for compiling the QDB2 plugin.
trans-unit.target: Qt DB2插件使其能够访问IBM DB2数据库。它已经在IBM DB2 v7.1和7.2中进行了测试。您必须安装IBM DB2开发客户端库,其中包含编译QDB2插件所需的头和库文件。

trans-unit.source: The Qt GUI module also contains a few math classes to aid with the most common mathmatical operations related to 3D graphics. These classes include QMatrix4x4, QVector4D and QQuaternion
trans-unit.target: Qt GUI模块还包​​含一些数学类，以协助进行与3D图形相关的最常见的数学运算。这些类包括QMatrix4x4，QVector4D和QQuaternion

trans-unit.source: The Qt GUI module contains classes for 2D graphics, imaging, fonts and advanced typography.
trans-unit.target: Qt GUI模块包含了2D图形、图像、字体和高级排版的类。

trans-unit.source: The Qt GUI module provides classes for windowing system integration, event handling, OpenGL and OpenGL ES integration, 2D graphics, basic imaging, fonts and text. These classes are used internally by Qt's user interface technologies and can also be used directly, for instance to write applications using low-level OpenGL ES graphics APIs.
trans-unit.target: Qt GUI模块提供了用于窗口系统集成、事件处理、OpenGL和OpenGL ES集成、2D图形、基本成像、字体和文本的类。这些类由Qt的用户界面技术在内部使用,也可以直接使用,例如使用低级OpenGL ES图形API编写应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Graphical Effects module provides a set of QML types for adding visually impressive and configurable effects to user interfaces. Effects are visual items that can be added to Qt Quick user interface as UI components.
trans-unit.target: Qt Graphical Effects模块提供了一组QML类型,用于向用户界面添加视觉上令人印象深刻和可配置的效果。效果是可以作为UI组件添加到Qt Quick用户界面的视觉项目。

trans-unit.source: The Qt InterBase plugin makes it possible to access the InterBase and Firebird databases. InterBase can either be used as a client/server or without a server in which case it operates on local files. The database file must exist before a connection can be established. Firebird must be used with a server configuration.
trans-unit.target: Qt InterBase 插件使得访问 InterBase 和 Firebird 数据库成为可能。InterBase既可以作为客户/服务器使用,也可以不使用服务器,在这种情况下,它可以在本地文件上运行。在建立连接之前,数据库文件必须存在。Firebird必须在服务器配置下使用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Labs Calendar module uses 0-based month numbers to be consistent with the JavaScript Date type, that is used by the QML language. This means that Date::getMonth() can be assigned to MonthGrid::month and WeekNumberColumn::month as is. When dealing with month numbers directly, it is highly recommended to use the following enumeration values to avoid confusion.
trans-unit.target: Qt Labs日历模块使用从0开始的月份数字，以与QML语言使用的JavaScript日期类型一致。这意味着可以将 Date::getMonth() 分配给MonthGrid :: month和WeekNumberColumn :: month。直接处理月份数字时，强烈建议使用以下枚举值以避免混淆。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Labs Platform module uses Qt Widgets as a fallback on platforms that do not have a native implementation available. Therefore, applications that use types from the Qt Labs Platform module should link to QtWidgets and use QApplication instead of QGuiApplication.
trans-unit.target: Qt Labs平台模块将Qt窗口小部件用作没有本机实现可用的平台的后备。因此，使用来自Qt Labs Platform模块的类型的应用程序应链接到QtWidgets并使用QApplication而不是QGuiApplication。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Labs Platform module uses Qt Widgets as a fallback on platforms that do not have a native implementation available. Therefore, applications that use types from the Qt Labs Platform module should link to QtWidgets and use QApplication instead of QGuiApplication.
The Qt Location API enables you to:
trans-unit.target: Qt Location API使你能够。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Location API helps you create viable mapping solutions using the data available from some of the popular location services.
trans-unit.target: Qt Location API可以帮助你使用一些流行的位置服务提供的数据创建可行的地图解决方案。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Location API provides the developer with a set of functions to interact with maps, navigational data and places of interest. This is particularly useful when associated with current position information which can be retrieved via the QtPositioning module.
trans-unit.target: Qt Location API为开发人员提供了一组与地图，导航数据和名胜古迹进行交互的功能。当与可以通过QtPositioning模块检索的当前位置信息相关联时，这特别有用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Location module's API allows access to map, navigation, and place data. It is possible to interact with tile maps using gestures to pan, flick, and zoom. Additional information such as routes or places may be displayed on the map.
trans-unit.target: Qt Location模块的API允许访问地图、导航和地方数据。它可以使用手势与磁贴地图进行交互,以平移、轻弹和缩放。在地图上可以显示额外的信息,如路线或地点。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Location provides the majority of its functionality through GeoService plugins. This document outlines how to develop a new GeoService plugin.
trans-unit.target: Qt Location通过GeoService插件提供了大部分功能。本文档概述了如何开发一个新的GeoService插件。

Since Qt 5.4, these free software licenses are GNU Lesser General Public License, version 3, or the GNU General Public License, version 2. See Qt Licensing for further details.

The Qt Multimedia module gives developers a simplified way to use audio and video playback, and access camera functionality. The Multimedia QML API provides a QML friendly interface to these features.
trans-unit.target: Qt多媒体模块为开发者提供了一种简化的方式来使用音频和视频播放,以及访问相机功能。多媒体QML API为这些功能提供了一个QML友好接口。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Multimedia module's VideoOutput item is not supported with the Software adaptation. This is because VideoOutput uses the QVideoRendererControl item which requires custom QSGGeometryNode behavior, which is only present in the default OpenGL adaptation.
trans-unit.target: 软件改编不支持Qt多媒体模块的VideoOutput项。这是因为VideoOutput使用QVideoRendererControl项，该项要求自定义QSGGeometryNode行为，该行为仅在默认的OpenGL适应中出现。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Multimedia module's VideoOutput item is not supported with the Software adaptation. This is because VideoOutput uses the QVideoRendererControl item which requires custom QSGGeometryNode behavior, which is only present in the default OpenGL adaptation.

The Qt Network module offers classes that allow you to write TCP/IP clients and servers. It offers lower-level classes such as QTcpSocket, QTcpServer and QUdpSocket that represent low level network concepts, and high level classes such as QNetworkRequest, QNetworkReply and QNetworkAccessManager to perform network operations using common protocols. It also offers classes such as QNetworkConfiguration, QNetworkConfigurationManager and QNetworkSession that implement bearer management.
trans-unit.target: Qt网络模块提供了允许您编写TCP / IP客户端和服务器的类。它提供了代表低级网络概念的低级类（例如QTcpSocket，QTcpServer和QUdpSocket），以及高级类（例如QNetworkRequest，QNetworkReply和QNetworkAccessManager）以使用通用协议执行网络操作。它还提供实现承载管理的类，例如QNetworkConfiguration，QNetworkConfigurationManager和QNetworkSession。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Network module offers classes that allow you to write TCP/IP clients and servers. It offers lower-level classes such as QTcpSocket, QTcpServer and QUdpSocket that represent low level network concepts, and high level classes such as QNetworkRequest, QNetworkReply and QNetworkAccessManager to perform network operations using common protocols. It also offers classes such as QNetworkConfiguration, QNetworkConfigurationManager and QNetworkSession that implement bearer management.
The Qt OCI plugin supports Oracle 9i, 10g and higher. After connecting to the Oracle server, the plugin will auto-detect the database version and enable features accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Qt OCI插件支持Oracle 9i、10g及以上版本。连接到Oracle服务器后,插件会自动检测数据库版本,并启用相应的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Qt OCI plugin supports authentication using external credentials (OCI_CRED_EXT). Usually, this means that the database server will use the user authentication provided by the operating system instead of its own authentication mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Qt OCI插件支持使用外部凭证(OCI_CRED_EXT)进行认证。通常,这意味着数据库服务器将使用操作系统提供的用户认证而不是自己的认证机制。

trans-unit.source: The Qt PDF module contains classes and functions for rendering PDF documents. The QPdfDocument class loads a PDF document and renders pages from it according to the options provided by the QPdfDocumentRenderOptions class. The QPdfPageRenderer class manages a queue that collects all render requests. The QPdfPageNavigation class handles the navigation through a PDF document.
The Qt Platform Abstraction (QPA) is the platform abstraction layer for Qt 5 and replaces Qt for Embedded Linux and the platform ports from Qt 4.
trans-unit.target: Qt平台抽象(QPA)是Qt 5的平台抽象层,取代了Qt for Embedded Linux和Qt 4的平台端口。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Positioning API gives developers the ability to determine a position by using a variety of possible sources, including satellite, or wifi, or text file, and so on. That information can then be used to for example determine a position on a map. In addition satellite information can be retrieved and area based monitoring can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Qt定位API使开发者能够通过使用各种可能的来源来确定位置,包括卫星、wifi或文本文件等。这些信息可以用来确定地图上的位置。此外,还可以检索卫星信息并进行基于区域的监测。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Positioning API provides positioning information via QML and C++ interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Qt定位API通过QML和C++接口提供定位信息。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Prerendered Font (QPF2) is an architecture-independent, light-weight and non-scalable font format.
trans-unit.target: Qt Prerendered Font (QPF2)是一种独立于架构的、轻量级的、不可缩放的字体格式。

The Qt Programming course is offered as a five day Open Enrollment Course. The classes are open to the public. Although the course is open to anyone who wants to learn, attendees should have significant experience in C++ development to derive maximum benefit from the course.
trans-unit.target: Qt编程课程是以公开招生的方式开设的,为期五天。课程是对公众开放的。虽然该课程对任何想学习的人开放,但参加者应该有丰富的C++开发经验,以便从该课程中获得最大的收益。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Purchasing module enables mobile developers to generate revenue from their applications on Android and iOS platforms. The module provides C++ and QML alternatives to support the In-App purchasing use case in Qt applications.
trans-unit.target: Qt采购模块使移动开发者能够从他们在Android和iOS平台上的应用中获得收入。该模块提供了C++和QML替代方案,以支持Qt应用程序中的应用内购买用例。

trans-unit.source: The Qt QML module contains the QML framework and important QML types used in applications. The constructs of QML are described in the The QML Reference.
The Qt QML module contains the QML framework and important QML types used in applications. The constructs of QML are described in the The QML Reference.
trans-unit.target: Qt QML模块包含QML框架和应用程序中使用的重要QML类型。QML的构造在《 QML参考》中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: The Qt QML module provides a framework for developing applications and libraries with the QML language. It defines and implements the language and engine infrastructure, and provides an API to enable application developers to extend the QML language with custom types and integrate QML code with JavaScript and C++. The Qt QML module provides both a QML API and a C++ API.
trans-unit.target: Qt QML模块提供了使用QML语言开发应用程序和库的框架。它定义并实现了语言和引擎基础结构，并提供了一个API，使应用程序开发人员能够使用自定义类型扩展QML语言并将QML代码与JavaScript和C ++集成在一起。Qt QML模块同时提供QML API和C ++ API。

trans-unit.source: The Qt QML module provides a framework for developing applications and libraries with the QML language. It defines and implements the language and engine infrastructure, and provides an API to enable application developers to extend the QML language with custom types and integrate QML code with JavaScript and C++. The Qt QML module provides both a QML API and a C++ API.
The Qt Quick 2D Renderer is in use
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick 2D Renderer正在使用中。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick Controls Styles submodule allows custom styling for Qt Quick Controls 1.
The Qt Quick Controls Styles submodule allows custom styling for Qt Quick Controls 1.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Controls样式子模块允许Qt Quick Controls 1的自定义样式。

Since Qt 5.4, these free software licenses are GNU Lesser General Public License, version 3, or the GNU General Public License, version 2. See Qt Licensing for further details.

The Qt Quick Controls module provides a set of controls that can be used to build complete interfaces in Qt Quick.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick控件模块提供了一组控件,可以用来在Qt Quick中构建完整的界面。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick Designer enables designing Qt Quick-based UIs using simple drag-n-drop gestures that most designers are familiar with. It offers UI elements from the Qt Quick and Qt Quick Controls 2 modules, as well as integration for custom UI elements.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Designer可以使用大多数设计师都熟悉的简单的拖放手势来设计基于Qt Quick的用户界面。它提供了Qt Quick和Qt Quick Controls 2模块中的UI元素,以及自定义UI元素的集成。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick Designer enables designing Qt Quick-based UIs using simple drag-n-drop gestures that most designers are familiar with. It offers UI elements from the Qt Quick and Qt Quick Controls modules, as well as integration for custom UI elements.

The Qt Quick Timeline module enables keyframe-based animations and parameterization. This module is directly supported by Qt Design Studio and Qt Quick Designer, with a timeline editor to create keyframe-based animations.
The Qt Quick anchoring system allows you to define relationships between the anchor lines of different items. For example, you can write:
trans-unit.target: Qt快速锚定系统允许你定义不同项目的锚线之间的关系。例如,你可以写

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick items in a QML scene populate a tree of QSGNode instances. Once created, this tree is a complete description of how a certain frame should be rendered. It does not contain any references back to the Qt Quick items at all and will on most platforms be processed and rendered in a separate thread. The renderer is a self contained part of the scene graph which traverses the QSGNode tree and uses geometry defined in QSGGeometryNode and shader state defined in QSGMaterial to schedule OpenGL state change and draw calls.
trans-unit.target: QML场景中的Qt Quick项目将填充QSGNode实例树。创建后，该树是如何渲染特定帧的完整描述。它根本不包含任何对Qt Quick项目的引用，并且在大多数平台上都将在单独的线程中进行处理和呈现。该渲染器是场景图横过的自包含部分QSGNode树和用途几何定义QSGGeometryNode和定义着色器状态QSGMaterial安排OpenGL的状态变化并绘制调用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick items in a QML scene populate a tree of QSGNode instances. Once created, this tree is a complete description of how a certain frame should be rendered. It does not contain any references back to the Qt Quick items at all and will on most platforms be processed and rendered in a separate thread. The renderer is a self contained part of the scene graph which traverses the QSGNode tree and uses geometry defined in QSGGeometryNode and shader state defined in QSGMaterial to update the graphics state and generate draw calls.

The Qt Quick module is the standard library for writing QML applications. While the Qt QML module provides the QML engine and language infrastructure, the Qt Quick module provides all the basic types necessary for creating user interfaces with QML. It provides a visual canvas and includes types for creating and animating visual components, receiving user input, creating data models and views and delayed object instantiation.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick模块是用于编写QML应用程序的标准库。虽然Qt的QML模块提供QML引擎和语言基础设施方面，Qt Quick的模块提供了所有必要的与QML创建用户界面的基本类型。它提供了一个视觉画布，并包括用于创建和动画化视觉组件，接收用户输入，创建数据模型和视图以及延​​迟对象实例化的类型。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick module provides both a QML API which supplies QML types for creating user interfaces with the QML language, and a C++ API for extending QML applications with C++ code.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick模块既提供了QML API（用于提供使用QML语言创建用户界面的QML类型），又提供了C ++ API（用于使用C ++代码扩展QML应用程序）。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick module provides both a QML API which supplies QML types for creating user interfaces with the QML language, and a C++ API for extending QML applications with C++ code.

The Qt Remote Objects module also includes qmake variables (REPC_SOURCE, REPC_REPLICA, and REPC_MERGED) that can be added to your project file to automatically run repc, and add the resulting files to the list of files processed by Meta Object Compiler during the build process, making use of Qt Remote Objects in your projects simple.
trans-unit.target: Qt远程对象模块还包括qmake变量（REPC_SOURCE，REPC_REPLICA和REPC_MERGED），可以将其添加到您的项目文件中以自动运行repc，并将生成的文件添加到在构建过程中由Meta Object Compiler处理的文件列表中，在您的项目中简化Qt远程对象的使用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Remote Objects module also includes qmake variables (REPC_SOURCE, REPC_REPLICA, and REPC_MERGED) that can be added to your project file to automatically run repc, and add the resulting files to the list of files processed by Meta Object Compiler during the build process, making use of Qt Remote Objects in your projects simple.

The Qt Remote Objects module provides an easy way to share Qt APIs between processes and devices. For this to work, we require a data channel between processes and devices. To establish this data channel, first, you need a QRemoteObjectNode.
The Qt Resource System
trans-unit.target: Qt资源系统

trans-unit.source: The Qt SAX2 implementation can report whether the reader has particular functionality using the QXmlReader::hasFeature() function. Available features can be tested with QXmlReader::feature(), and switched on or off using QXmlReader::setFeature().
trans-unit.target: Qt SAX2实现可以使用QXmlReader :: hasFeature（）函数报告阅读器是否具有特定功能。可用的功能可以使用QXmlReader :: feature（）进行测试，并可以使用QXmlReader :: setFeature（）打开或关闭。

trans-unit.target: Qt SCXML编译器将生成各种 evaluateTo 方法，并将表达式和脚本转换为这些方法内部的lambda。例如：

trans-unit.source: The Qt SCXML implementation extends SCXML in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: Qt SCXML的实现以下列方式扩展了SCXML。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SCXML implementation is SCXML compliant, with a few exceptions:
trans-unit.target: Qt SCXML的实现是符合SCXML标准的,但有一些例外。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SCXML module provides functionality to create state machines from SCXML files. This includes both dynamically creating state machines (loading the SCXML file and instantiating states and transitions) and generating a C++ file that has a class implementing the state machine. It also contains functionality to support data models and executable content.

The Qt SCXML module provides functionality to create state machines from SCXML files. This includes both dynamically creating state machines (loading the SCXML file and instantiating states and transitions) and generating a C++ file that has a class implementing the state machine. It also contains functionality to support data models and executable content.
trans-unit.target: Qt SCXML模块提供了从SCXML文件创建状态机的功能。这既包括动态创建状态机（加载SCXML文件以及实例化状态和转换），也包括生成具有实现状态机类的C ++文件。它还包含支持数据模型和可执行内容的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SQL module uses driver plugins to communicate with the different database APIs. Since Qt's SQL Module API is database-independent, all database-specific code is contained within these drivers. Several drivers are supplied with Qt, and other drivers can be added. The driver source code is supplied and can be used as a model for writing your own drivers.
trans-unit.target: Qt SQL模块使用驱动程序插件与不同的数据库API通信。由于Qt的SQL模块API与数据库无关，因此所有特定于数据库的代码都包含在这些驱动程序中。Qt提供了几个驱动程序，并且可以添加其他驱动程序。提供了驱动程序源代码，可以将其用作编写自己的驱动程序的模型。

trans-unit.source: The Qt SQL module uses driver plugins to communicate with the different database APIs. Since Qt's SQL Module API is database-independent, all database-specific code is contained within these drivers. Several drivers are supplied with Qt, and other drivers can be added. The driver source code is supplied and can be used as a model for writing your own drivers.
The Qt Sensors - Grue Sensor Example demonstrates creation of a sensor backend
trans-unit.target: Qt Sensors-Grue Sensor 示例演示了传感器后台的创建。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Sensors API has a front end, for application developers to use and a back end, where device implementors write code to access their hardware. As an application developer you do not need to access the back end though it may be useful to understand how it works.
trans-unit.target: Qt Sensors API有一个前端,供应用开发者使用,还有一个后端,设备实现者在后端写代码来访问他们的硬件。作为应用开发者,你不需要访问后端,但了解它的工作原理可能会很有用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Sensors API provides access to sensor hardware via QML and C++ interfaces. The Qt Sensors API also provides a motion gesture recognition API for devices.
trans-unit.target: Qt Sensors API通过QML和C++接口提供对传感器硬件的访问。Qt Sensors API还为设备提供了运动手势识别API。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Sensors module's APIs allow access to various hardware sensors. Accelerometers, light sensors, compass, and gyroscope sensors are one of the many types of sensors supported by the QML and C++ APIs.
trans-unit.target: Qt Sensors模块的API允许访问各种硬件传感器。加速计、光传感器、罗盘和陀螺仪传感器是QML和C++API支持的众多类型的传感器之一。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Serial Bus API provides classes and functions to access the various industrial serial buses and protocols, such as CAN, ModBus, and others.
trans-unit.target: Qt串行总线API提供了访问各种工业串行总线和协议的类和函数,如CAN、ModBus等。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Virtual Keyboard project is a Qt 5 input context plugin which implements QPlatformInputContextPlugin and QPlatformInputContext interfaces. These interfaces allow the plugin to be used as a platform input context plugin in Qt 5 applications.
trans-unit.target: Qt Virtual Keyboard项目是一个Qt 5输入上下文插件,它实现了QPlatformInputContextPlugin和QPlatformInputContext接口。这些接口允许该插件在Qt 5应用程序中作为平台输入上下文插件使用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Virtual Keyboard project provides an input framework and reference keyboard frontend for Qt 5 on Linux Desktop/X11, Windows Desktop, and Boot2Qt targets.
trans-unit.target: Qt虚拟键盘项目为Linux Desktop / X11，Windows Desktop和Boot2Qt目标上的Qt 5提供了输入框架和参考键盘前端。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Virtual Keyboard supports third-party plugins from the following vendors:
trans-unit.target: Qt虚拟键盘支持以下厂商的第三方插件。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor can be used from C++ or QML:
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland Compositor可以从C++或QML中使用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor includes features necessary to create a compositor:
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland Compositor包含了创建一个合成器所需的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor is a module that provides convenient and powerful QML and C++ APIs for developing custom display servers based on the Wayland protocol. The display server, often called a compositor, displays content from client applications that support the Wayland protocol.
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland合成器是一个模块，该模块提供了方便而强大的QML和C ++ API，用于开发基于Wayland协议的自定义显示服务器。显示服务器（通常称为合成器）显示来自支持Wayland协议的客户端应用程序的内容。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor is an API for building your own compositor. It gives you full freedom to build a custom compositor UI and manage the windows of various clients. You can combine both Qt Quick and QML with the Qt Wayland Compositor to create impressive, imaginative UIs. For more information, see Qt Wayland Compositor.

The Qt Wayland Compositor is an API for building your own compositor. It gives you full freedom to build a custom compositor UI and manage the windows of various clients. You can combine both Qt Quick and QML with the Qt Wayland Compositor to create impressive, imaginative UIs. For more information, see Qt Wayland Compositor.
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland合成器是用于构建自己的合成器的API。它使您可以完全自由地构建自定义的合成器UI并管理各种客户端的窗口。您可以将Qt Quick和QML与Qt Wayland Compositor结合使用，以创建令人印象深刻，富于想象力的UI。有关更多信息，请参见Qt Wayland Compositor。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Wayland Compositor recognizes the following environment variables and command-line arguments:
trans-unit.target: Qt Wayland Compositor 识别以下环境变量和命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: The Qt WebEngine module provides web developer tools that make it easy to inspect and debug layout and performance issues of any web content.
trans-unit.target: Qt WebEngine模块提供了web开发者工具,使其可以轻松检查和调试任何web内容的布局和性能问题。

trans-unit.source: The Qt WebSockets module provides C++ and QML interfaces that enable Qt applications to act as a server that can process WebSocket requests, or a client that can consume data received from the server, or both.
trans-unit.target: Qt WebSockets模块提供了C++和QML接口,使Qt应用程序能够充当可以处理WebSocket请求的服务器,或可以消费从服务器接收的数据的客户端,或两者兼而有之。

The Qt XML module provides an abstract class, QXmlReader, that defines the interface for potential SAX2 readers. Qt includes a reader implementation, QXmlSimpleReader, that is easy to adapt through subclassing.
trans-unit.target: Qt XML模块提供了一个抽象类QXmlReader，它为潜在的SAX2阅读器定义了接口。Qt包含一个阅读器实现QXmlSimpleReader，该实现很容易通过子类进行调整。

The Qt build is a static build, and does not support threads.

The Qt build system uses the tool llvm-config to discover the location of LLVM on your system, and relies on the path to llvm-config being in the PATH environment variable to do so. llvm-config is commonly installed with LLVM and Clang on Linux systems, and also on macOS if LLVM is installed using Brew.
trans-unit.target: Qt构建系统使用工具 llvm-config 来发现LLVM在系统上的位置，并依靠 PATH 环境变量中llvm-config的路径来执行此操作。 llvm-config 通常与LLVM和Clang一起安装在Linux系统上，如果LLVM是使用Brew安装的，则也通常安装在macOS上。

trans-unit.source: The Qt build system uses the tool llvm-config to discover the location of LLVM on your system, and relies on the path to llvm-config being in the PATH environment variable to do so. llvm-config is commonly installed with LLVM and Clang on Linux systems, and also on macOS if LLVM is installed using Brew.

The Qt class has nothing unusual for Qt users, and as even the Qt specialities like Q_PROPERTY, slots and signals are implemented with straight C++ they don't cause any trouble when compiling this class with any C++ compiler.
trans-unit.target: Qt类对于Qt用户而言并没有什么异常，即使Qt特殊特性（如 Q_PROPERTY )， slots 和 signals 都是使用直接的C ++实现的，因此在使用任何C ++编译器编译此类时都不会造成任何麻烦。

trans-unit.source: The Qt implementation of these macros prints to the stderr output under Unix/X11 and macOS. With Windows, if it is a console application, the text is sent to console; otherwise, it is sent to the debugger.
trans-unit.target: 这些宏的Qt实现在Unix / X11和macOS下输出到 stderr 输出。在Windows中，如果它是控制台应用程序，则将文本发送到控制台；否则，它将发送到调试器。

trans-unit.source: The Qt installation package comes with OpenSSL support but the OpenSSL libraries are not part of the package due to legal restrictions in some countries. If your application depends on OpenSSL, consider packaging the SSL libraries with your Application Package (APK) as the target device may or may not have them.

The Qt installation package comes with OpenSSL support but the OpenSSL libraries are not part of the package due to legal restrictions in some countries. If your application depends on OpenSSL, consider packaging the SSL libraries with your Application Package (APK) as the target device may or may not have them. You can use the QSslSocket::supportsSsl() static function to check for SSL support on the target.
trans-unit.target: Qt安装软件包带有OpenSSL支持，但是由于某些国家/地区的法律限制，OpenSSL库不属于软件包的一部分。如果您的应用程序依赖于OpenSSL，请考虑将SSL库与应用程序包（APK）打包在一起，因为目标设备可能有也可能没有。您可以使用QSslSocket :: supportsSsl（）静态函数来检查目标服务器上的SSL支持。

trans-unit.source: The Qt installers for Linux assume that a C++ compiler, debugger, make, and other development tools are provided by the host operating system. In addition, building graphical Qt applications requires OpenGL libraries and headers installed. Most Linux distributions do not install all of these by default, but setting up a development environment is still straightforward.
trans-unit.target: Linux的Qt安装程序假定主机操作系统提供了C++编译器、调试器、make和其他开发工具。此外,构建图形化的Qt应用程序需要安装OpenGL库和头文件。大多数Linux发行版默认不安装所有这些,但设置开发环境还是很简单的。

trans-unit.source: The Qt layout system provides a simple and powerful way of automatically arranging child widgets within a widget to ensure that they make good use of the available space.
trans-unit.target: Qt布局系统提供了一种简单而强大的方式来自动安排一个widget中的子widget,以确保它们能很好地利用可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The Qt layout system provides a simple and powerful way of specifying the layout of child widgets.
trans-unit.target: Qt布局系统提供了一种简单而强大的方式来指定子部件的布局。

trans-unit.source: The Qt library contains hundreds of internal checks that will print warning messages when a programming error is detected. We therefore recommend that you use a debug version of Qt when developing Qt-based software.
trans-unit.target: Qt库中包含数百个内部检查,当检测到编程错误时,会打印出警告信息。因此,我们建议你在开发基于Qt的软件时,使用Qt的调试版本。

trans-unit.source: The Qt library provides a set of general purpose template-based container classes. These classes can be used to store items of a specified type. For example, if you need a resizable array of QStrings, use QVector<QString>.
trans-unit.target: Qt库提供了一组基于通用模板的容器类。这些类可用于存储指定类型的项目。例如，如果您需要一个可调整大小的QString数组，请使用QVector < QString >。

trans-unit.source: The Qt port was originally written for WinRT and updated to support UWP. The port uses the C++ capabilities. While UWP supports the component extensions internally, they are not used inside Qt and you do not need to use them. UWP applications run in a sandboxed environment for security reasons and support different architectures, such as ARM and x86.

The Qt resource system is a platform-independent mechanism for storing binary files in the application's executable. This is useful if your application always needs a certain set of files (icons, translation files, etc.) and you don't want to run the risk of losing the files.
trans-unit.target: Qt资源系统是一种独立于平台的机制,用于在应用程序的可执行文件中存储二进制文件。如果你的应用程序总是需要一组特定的文件(图标、翻译文件等),而你又不想冒着丢失文件的风险,那么这个机制就很有用。

trans-unit.source: The Qt source packages include third-party libraries. To set whether Qt should use the system's versions of the libraries or to use the bundled version, pass either -system or -qt before the name of the library to configure.
trans-unit.target: Qt源程序包包括第三方库。要设置的Qt是否应该使用图书馆的系统版本或使用捆绑的版本，通过其中 -system 或 -qt 库配置的名称之前。

The QtConcurrent namespace provides high-level APIs that make it possible to write multi-threaded programs without using low-level threading primitives. More...

The QtConcurrent::filter(), QtConcurrent::filtered() and QtConcurrent::filteredReduced() functions filter items in a sequence such as a QList or a QVector in parallel. QtConcurrent::filter() modifies a sequence in-place, QtConcurrent::filtered() returns a new sequence containing the filtered content, and QtConcurrent::filteredReduced() returns a single result.
trans-unit.target: QtConcurrent :: filter（），QtConcurrent :: filtered（）和QtConcurrent :: filteredReduced（）函数可按顺序过滤诸如QList或QVector之类的项。QtConcurrent :: filter（）修改一个序列，QtConcurrent :: filtered（）返回一个包含过滤内容的新序列，而QtConcurrent :: filteredReduced（）返回一个结果。

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent::map(), QtConcurrent::mapped() and QtConcurrent::mappedReduced() functions run computations in parallel on the items in a sequence such as a QList or a QVector. QtConcurrent::map() modifies a sequence in-place, QtConcurrent::mapped() returns a new sequence containing the modified content, and QtConcurrent::mappedReduced() returns a single result.
trans-unit.target: QtConcurrent :: map（），QtConcurrent :: mapped（）和QtConcurrent :: mappedReduced（）函数对诸如QList或QVector之类的项目并行运行计算。QtConcurrent :: map（）修改一个序列，QtConcurrent :: mapped（）返回一个包含修改内容的新序列，而QtConcurrent :: mappedReduced（）返回单个结果。

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent::run() function runs a function in a separate thread. The return value of the function is made available through the QFuture API.
trans-unit.target: QtConcurrent :: run（）函数在单独的线程中运行一个函数。该函数的返回值可通过QFuture API获得。

trans-unit.source: The RGB model is hardware-oriented. Its representation is close to what most monitors show. In contrast, HSV represents color in a way more suited to the human perception of color. For example, the relationships "stronger than", "darker than", and "the opposite of" are easily expressed in HSV but are much harder to express in RGB.
trans-unit.target: RGB模型是面向硬件的。它的表示方式接近于大多数显示器的显示方式。相比之下,HSV表示颜色的方式更适合人类对颜色的感知。例如,"强于"、"暗于"、"相反 "等关系在HSV中很容易表达,但在RGB中却很难表达。

The RenderSurfaceSelector can be used to select the surface, where Qt3D renders the content. The surface can either be window surface or offscreen surface. The externalRenderTargetSize is used to specify the actual size of the render target when offscreen surface is used.

trans-unit.source: The Repeater type creates all of its delegate items when the repeater is first created. This can be inefficient if there are a large number of delegate items and not all of the items are required to be visible at the same time. If this is the case, consider using other view types like ListView (which only creates delegate items when they are scrolled into view) or use the Dynamic Object Creation methods to create items as they are required.
trans-unit.target: 首次创建中继器时，Repeater类型将创建其所有委托项目。如果存在大量的委托项目，并且并非所有项目都必须同时可见，则效率可能较低。如果是这种情况，请考虑使用其他视图类型，例如ListView（仅当它们滚动到视图中时才创建委托项），或使用动态对象创建方法根据需要创建项。

trans-unit.source: The Repeater type is used to create a large number of similar items. Like other view types, a Repeater has a model and a delegate: for each entry in the model, the delegate is instantiated in a context seeded with data from the model. A Repeater item is usually enclosed in a positioner type such as Row or Column to visually position the multiple delegate items created by the Repeater.

trans-unit.source: The ReviewModel is a read-only model used to fetch reviews about a Place. The model incrementally fetches. The number of reviews which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of reviews available can be accessed via the totalCount property.

The Revised Julian calendar, also known as the Milanković calendar, or, less formally, new calendar, is a calendar, developed and proposed by the Serbian scientist Milutin Milanković in 1923, which effectively discontinued the 340 years of divergence between the naming of dates sanctioned by those Eastern Orthodox churches adopting it and the Gregorian calendar that has come to predominate worldwide. This calendar was intended to replace the ecclesiastical calendar based on the Julian calendar hitherto in use by all of the Eastern Orthodox Church. The Revised Julian calendar temporarily aligned its dates with the Gregorian calendar proclaimed in 1582 by Pope Gregory XIII for adoption by the Christian world. The calendar has been adopted by the Orthodox churches of Constantinople, Albania, Alexandria, Antioch, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Greece, Poland, and Romania.

trans-unit.source: The SOCKS5 support since Qt 4 is based on RFC 1928 and RFC 1929. The supported authentication methods are no authentication and username/password authentication. Both IPv4 and IPv6 are supported. Domain names are resolved through the SOCKS5 server if the QNetworkProxy::HostNameLookupCapability is enabled, otherwise they are resolved locally and the IP address is sent to the server. There are several things to remember when using SOCKS5 with QUdpSocket and QTcpServer:

The Scene3D type renders a Qt3D scene, provided by an Entity, into a multisampled Framebuffer object. This object is later blitted into a non-multisampled Framebuffer object, which is then rendered with premultiplied alpha. If multisampling is not required, it can be avoided by setting the multisample property to false. In this case Scene3D will render directly into the non-multisampled Framebuffer object.

trans-unit.source: The ShaderEffect type applies a custom vertex and fragment (pixel) shader to a rectangle. It allows you to write effects such as drop shadow, blur, colorize and page curl directly in QML.
The ShaderEffect type can be combined with layered items.

The ShaderEffectSource type does not redirect any mouse or keyboard input to sourceItem. If you hide the sourceItem by setting visible to false or opacity to zero, it will no longer react to input. In cases where the ShaderEffectSource is meant to replace the sourceItem, you typically want to hide the sourceItem while still handling input. For this, you can use the hideSource property.

The ShaderEffectSource type renders sourceItem into a texture and displays it in the scene. sourceItem is drawn into the texture as though it was a fully opaque root item. Thus sourceItem itself can be invisible, but still appear in the texture.

trans-unit.source: The Software adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 that uses the Raster paint engine to render the contents of the scene graph, instead of OpenGL. Consequently, some features and optimizations are not available. Most Qt Quick 2 applications can run without any modification, but any attempts to use unsupported features are ignored. By using the Software adaptation, it is possible to run Qt Quick 2 applications on hardware and platforms that do not have OpenGL support.
The Software adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 that uses the raster paint engine to render the contents of the scene graph. For more details, see Software Adaptation.

The Software adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 that uses the Raster paint engine to render the contents of the scene graph, instead of OpenGL. Consequently, some features and optimizations are not available. Most Qt Quick 2 applications can run without any modification, but any attempts to use unsupported features are ignored. By using the Software adaptation, it is possible to run Qt Quick 2 applications on hardware and platforms that do not have OpenGL support.
trans-unit.target: 该软件改编版是Qt Quick 2 的替代渲染器，它使用Raster绘制引擎而不是OpenGL渲染场景图的内容。因此，某些功能和优化不可用。大多数Qt Quick 2应用程序都可以运行，而无需进行任何修改，但是任何使用不受支持的功能的尝试都将被忽略。通过使用软件改编，可以在不支持OpenGL的硬件和平台上运行Qt Quick 2应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The Software adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 that uses the raster paint engine to render the contents of the scene graph. For more details, see Software Adaptation.

trans-unit.source: The Software adaptation was previously known as the Qt Quick 2D Renderer. However, unlike the 2D Renderer, this new, integrated version supports partial updates. This means that a full update of the window or screen contents is now avoided; only the changed areas are flushed. Partial updates can significantly improve performance for many applications.
trans-unit.target: 该软件适配版之前被称为Qt Quick 2D Renderer。然而,与2D渲染器不同,这个新的集成版本支持部分更新。这意味着现在避免了对窗口或屏幕内容的全面更新,只对改变的区域进行刷新。部分更新可以显著提高许多应用程序的性能。

trans-unit.source: The Solar Hijri calendar (also called Persian).

The Solar Hijri calendar produces a five-year leap year interval after about every seven four-year leap year intervals. It usually follows a 33-year cycle with occasional interruptions by single 29-year or 37-year subcycles. The reason for this behavior is that it tracks the observed vernal equinox. By contrast, some less accurate predictive algorithms are in use based on confusion between the average tropical year (365.2422 days, approximated with near 128-year cycles or 2820-year great cycles) and the mean interval between spring equinoxes (365.2424 days, approximated with a near 33-year cycle).

The Solar Hijri calendar, also called the Solar Hejri calendar, Shamsi Hijri calendar or Jalali calendar, is the official calendar of Iran and Afghanistan. It begins on the vernal equinox (Nowruz) as determined by astronomical calculation for the Iran Standard Time meridian (52.5°E or GMT+3.5h). This determination of starting moment is more accurate than the Gregorian calendar for predicting the date of the vernal equinox, because it uses astronomical observations rather than mathematical rules.

trans-unit.source: The State Machine Framework
trans-unit.target: 状态机框架

trans-unit.source: The State Machine framework provides an API and execution model that can be used to effectively embed the elements and semantics of statecharts in Qt applications. The framework integrates tightly with Qt's meta-object system; for example, transitions between states can be triggered by signals, and states can be configured to set properties and invoke methods on {QObject}s. Qt's event system is used to drive the state machines.
trans-unit.target: 状态机框架提供了API和执行模型，可用于将状态图的元素和语义有效地嵌入Qt应用程序中。该框架与Qt的元对象系统紧密集成。例如，状态之间的转换可以由信号触发，状态可以配置为设置属性并调用{ QObject }上的方法。Qt的事件系统用于驱动状态机。

trans-unit.source: The State Machine framework provides classes for creating and executing state graphs. The concepts and notation are based on those from Harel's Statecharts: A visual formalism for complex systems, which is also the basis of UML state diagrams. The semantics of state machine execution are based on State Chart XML (SCXML).
trans-unit.target: 状态机框架提供了用于创建和执行状态图的类。概念和表示法基于Harel的Statecharts：复杂系统的可视化形式主义，也是UML状态图的基础。状态机执行的语义基于状态图XML（SCXML）。

trans-unit.source: The Surface of the parent WaylandQuickItem will be drawn in a hardware specific way instead of the regular way using the QtQuick scene graph. On some platforms, the WaylandQuickItem's current buffer and the scene graph can be blended in a separate step. This makes it possible for clients to update continuously without triggering a full redraw of the compositor scene graph for each frame.
trans-unit.target: 父WaylandQuickItem的Surface 将以硬件特定方式绘制，而不是使用QtQuick场景图以常规方式绘制。在某些平台上，可以在单独的步骤中混合WaylandQuickItem的当前缓冲区和场景图。这样，客户端就可以连续更新而无需触发每个帧的合成器场景图的完全重绘。

trans-unit.source: The Transform component is not shareable between multiple Entity's. The transformation is held as vector3d scale, quaternion rotation and vector3d translation components. trans-unit.source: The URIs used for features and properties often look like URLs, e.g. http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace. This does not mean that the data required is at this address. It is simply a way of defining unique names.
trans-unit.target: 用于功能和属性的URI通常看起来像URL，例如 http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace 。这并不意味着所需的数据位于此地址。这只是定义唯一名称的一种方式。

trans-unit.source: The URL being intercepted is a url property in a QML file, and not being used to load a file through the engine.
trans-unit.target: 被拦截的URL是QML文件中的一个url属性,而不是通过引擎来加载文件。

trans-unit.source: The URL being intercepted is an import for a Javascript file.
trans-unit.target: 被拦截的URL是一个Javascript文件的导入。

trans-unit.source: The URL being intercepted is for a Qml file. Intercepting this, but not the Qmldir file, leaves the base dir of a QML file untouched and acts like replacing the file with another file.
trans-unit.target: 被拦截的URL是一个Qml文件。拦截这个文件,但不拦截Qmldir文件,会使QML文件的基目录不受影响,就像用另一个文件替换该文件一样。

trans-unit.source: The URL being intercepted is for a Qmldir file. Intercepting this, but not the QmlFile, allows for swapping out entire sub trees.
trans-unit.target: 被拦截的URL是一个Qmldir文件。拦截这个,但不拦截QmlFile,就可以交换整个子树。

trans-unit.source: The URL does not represent a valid file or location to read it from, it is primarily a key to access images through Qt Quick's image-based types.
trans-unit.target: URL并不代表读取它的有效文件或位置,它主要是通过Qt Quick的图像类型来访问图像的一个键。

trans-unit.source: The URL is run through a conformance test. Every part of the URL must conform to the standard encoding rules of the URI standard for the URL to be reported as valid.
trans-unit.target: URL将通过一致性测试来运行。URL的每一个部分都必须符合URI标准的标准编码规则,URL才能被报告为有效。

trans-unit.source: The URL is stored in the generated index file for the project. QDoc will use this as the base URL when constructing external links to content listed in the index.
trans-unit.target: 该URL存储在项目生成的索引文件中,QDoc将以此为基础URL,构建指向索引中所列内容的外部链接。QDoc在构建指向索引中列出的内容的外部链接时,会将其作为基础URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL is stored in the generated index file for the project. When we use the index on its own, QDoc will use this as the base URL when constructing links to classes, functions, and other things listed in the index.
trans-unit.target: 这个URL存储在项目生成的索引文件中。当我们单独使用索引的时候,QDoc在构建索引中列出的类、函数和其他东西的链接时,会将其作为基础URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL is used as-is. URLs that originate from user input should be parsed with QUrl::fromUserInput().

trans-unit.source: The VBarModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A vertical model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and QAbstractBarSeries, so that each column in the data model defines a bar set and each row maps to a category in a bar series. You need to implement the data model and expose it to QML.

The VBoxPlotModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A vertical model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and a BoxPlotSeries type, so that each column in the data model defines a box-and-whiskers item and each row maps to the range and three median values of the box-and-whiskers item.

trans-unit.source: The ViewTransition attached property provides the following properties specific to the item to which the transition is applied:

The ViewTransition.targetIndexes and ViewTransition.targetItems lists provide the items and indexes of all delegate instances that are the targets of the relevant operation. For an add operation, these are all the items that are added into the view; for a remove, these are all the items removed from the view, and so on. (Note these lists will only contain references to items that have been created within the view or its cached items; targets that are not within the visible area of the view or within the item cache will not be accessible.)
The ViewTransition.item property gives a reference to the item to which the transition is being applied. This can be used to access any of the item's attributes, custom property values, and so on.

The WaylandCompositor manages the connections to the clients, as well as the different outputs and seats.

The WaylandOutput manages a rectangular area within bounds of the compositor's geometry, to use it for displaying client content. This could, for instance, be a screen managed by the WaylandCompositor.
The WaylandSeat type provides access to different types of user input and maintains a keyboard focus and a mouse pointer. It corresponds to the wl_seat interface in the Wayland protocol.
The WaylandView corresponds to the presentation of a surface on a specific output, managing the buffers that contain the contents to be rendered. You can have several views into the same surface.
The Waypoint type provides a mean to specify a waypoint in a RouteQuery in a more detailed way than by using a simple coordinate. More...

The WebEngineSettings type can be used to configure browser properties and generic attributes, such as JavaScript support, focus behavior, and access to remote content. This type is uncreatable, but the default settings for all web engine views can be accessed by using the WebEngine.settings property.

The WebEngineView type enables QML applications to render regions of dynamic web content. It may share the screen with other QML types, such as a TabView, or fill the screen, as specified within the QML application.

The WebSockets specification as outlined in RFC 6455 requires that all communication from client to server be masked. This is to prevent malicious scripts from attacking badly behaving proxies. For more information about the importance of good masking, see "Talking to Yourself for Fun and Profit" by Lin-Shung Huang et al. By default QWebSocket uses the reasonably secure QRandomGenerator::global()->generate() function. The best measure against attacks mentioned in the document above, is to use QWebSocket over a secure connection (

trans-unit.source: The Windows system registry has the following limitations: A subkey may not exceed 255 characters, an entry's value may not exceed 16,383 characters, and all the values of a key may not exceed 65,535 characters. trans-unit.source: The X11 Window System has the concept of a separate selection and clipboard. When text is selected, it is immediately available as the global mouse selection. The global mouse selection may later be copied to the clipboard. By convention, the middle mouse button is used to paste the global mouse selection.
trans-unit.target: X11窗口系统有单独的选择和剪贴板的概念。当文本被选中时,它将立即作为全局鼠标选择。全局鼠标选区以后可以复制到剪贴板。按照惯例,鼠标中键是用来粘贴全局鼠标选择的。

The XML declaration that appears at the top of an XML document, typically <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>, is treated by QDom as a processing instruction. This is unfortunate, since the XML declaration is not a processing instruction; among other differences, it cannot be inserted into a document anywhere but on the first line.
trans-unit.target: QDom将出现在XML文档顶部的XML声明（通常为 <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> 1.0'encoding ='UTF-8'？>）作为处理指令。不幸的是，因为XML声明不是处理指令；因此，请参见。除其他差异外，无法将其插入文档中的第一行。

trans-unit.source: The XML reader must be told which handler to use for different kinds of events during parsing. This means that, although QXmlDefaultHandler provides default implementations of functions inherited from all its base classes, we can still use specialized handlers for particular kinds of events.
trans-unit.target: 必须告知XML阅读器在解析期间对不同类型的事件使用哪个处理程序。这意味着，尽管QXmlDefaultHandler提供了从其所有基类继承的函数的默认实现，但对于特定类型的事件，我们仍然可以使用专门的处理程序。

The Xcode Active Build Configurations settings are for modifying Xcode configurations, compiler flags and similar build options. Unlike Visual Studio, Xcode does not allow for the selection of specific library files based on whether debug or release build configurations are selected. The qmake debug and release settings control which library files are linked to the executable.
trans-unit.target: Xcode Active Build Configurations设置用于修改Xcode配置、编译器标志和类似的构建选项。与Visual Studio不同的是,Xcode不允许根据选择调试或发布构建配置来选择特定的库文件。qmake调试和发布设置控制哪些库文件被链接到可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: The XdgDecorationManagerV1 extension provides a way for a compositor to announce support for server-side window decorations, and for xdg-shell clients to communicate whether they prefer client-side or server-side decorations.
The XdgOutputManagerV1 extension provides a way for a compositor to describe outputs in a way that is more in line with the concept of an output on desktop oriented systems.

The XdgShell extension provides a way to associate a XdgToplevel or XdgPopup with a regular Wayland surface. Using the XdgToplevel interface, the client can request that the surface is resized, moved, and so on.

The XdgShellV5 extension provides a way to associate an XdgSurfaceV5 with a regular Wayland surface. Using the xdg_surface interface, the client can request that the surface is resized, moved, and so on.

The XdgShellV6 extension provides a way to associate a XdgToplevelV6 or XdgPopupV6 with a regular Wayland surface. Using the XdgToplevelV6 interface, the client can request that the surface is resized, moved, and so on.

trans-unit.source: The \caption command provides a caption for an image.
trans-unit.target: \caption命令为图像提供一个标题。

trans-unit.source: The \code and \endcode commands enclose a snippet of source code.
trans-unit.target: 编码和endcode命令包含一段源代码。

trans-unit.source: The \codeline command inserts a blank line of preformatted text. It is used to insert gaps between snippets without closing the current preformatted text area and opening a new one.
trans-unit.target: \codeline命令插入一行空白的预格式化文本。它用于在片段之间插入空白,而不需要关闭当前的预格式化文本区域并打开一个新的区域。

trans-unit.source: The \contentspage command links the current page to a table of contents page. The command follows the same syntax and argument convention as the \previouspage command.
trans-unit.target: \ contentspage命令将当前页面链接到目录页面。该命令与\ previouspage命令遵循相同的语法和参数约定。

trans-unit.source: The \default command is for marking a QML property as the default property. The word default is displayed in the documentation of the property.
trans-unit.target: \ default命令用于将QML属性标记为default属性。这个词 default 显示属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: The \ditamap command is for creating a DITA map using qdoc commands. The \ditamap command is a kind of \page command that produces a
trans-unit.target: \ditamap命令用于使用qdoc命令创建一个DITA地图。\ditamap命令是一种\page命令,它可以生成一个 "DITA "地图。

trans-unit.source: The \div and \enddiv commands delimit a large or small block of text (which may include other QDoc commands) to which special formatting attributes should be applied.
trans-unit.target: \div和\enddiv命令限定了一个大的或小的文本块(可能包括其他QDoc命令),这些文本块应该应用特殊的格式属性。

trans-unit.source: The \dontdocument command is only used in a dontdocument.qdoc file for a particular module. This file specifies publically declared classes or structs that are not meant to be documented. QDoc will not print warnings about missing \class comments for these classes and structs.
The \dots command indicates that parts of the source file have been omitted when quoting a file.
trans-unit.target: \dots命令表示在引用文件时省略了源文件的部分内容。

trans-unit.source: The \e QPushButton's checked property is false by default.
trans-unit.target: QPushButton的checked属性默认为false。

trans-unit.source: The \e command renders its argument in a special font, normally italics. This command used to be called \i, which is now deprecated.
trans-unit.target: ie命令用一种特殊的字体来渲染它的参数,通常是斜体。这条命令过去叫作"\i",现在已经废弃。

trans-unit.source: The \else command can only be used within \if...\endif commands, but is useful when there is only two alternatives.
trans-unit.target: \ else命令只能在\ if ... \ endif命令中使用，但是在只有两个替代方法时很有用。

trans-unit.source: The \else command can only be used within \if...\endif commands, but is useful when there is only two alternatives.
The \else command specifies an alternative if the condition in the \if command is false.
trans-unit.target: 所述\别的命令指定了一个选择，如果在条件\如果命令是假的。

trans-unit.source: The \else command specifies an alternative if the condition in the \if command is false.
The \endif command and the corresponding \if command enclose parts of a QDoc comment that will be included if the condition specified by the \if command's argument is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果由\ if命令的参数指定的条件为true ，则\ endif命令和相应的\ if命令将包含QDoc注释的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The \endif command and the corresponding \if command enclose parts of a QDoc comment that will be included if the condition specified by the \if command's argument is true.
The \footnote and \endfootnote commands delimit a footnote.
trans-unit.target: footnote和endfootnote命令对脚注进行定界。

trans-unit.source: The \generatelist command expands to a list of links to the documentation entities in a group. Below is an example from the Qt Reference Documentation:
trans-unit.target: \generatelist命令扩展为一组文档实体的链接列表。下面是Qt参考文档中的一个例子。

trans-unit.source: The \header command indicates that the following table cells are the current table's column headers.
trans-unit.target: \header命令表示以下表格单元格是当前表格的列头。

trans-unit.source: The \if command and the corresponding \endif command enclose parts of a QDoc comment that only will be included if the condition specified by the command's argument is true.
trans-unit.target: if命令和相应的endif命令包含了QDoc注释的一部分,只有当命令参数指定的条件为真时才会被包含。

trans-unit.source: The \image command expands to the image specified by its first argument, and renders it centered as a separate paragraph.
trans-unit.target: image命令扩展到第一个参数所指定的图像,并将其作为一个单独的段落居中。

trans-unit.source: The \include command sends all or part of the file specified by its first argument to the QDoc input stream to be processed as a QDoc comment snippet.
trans-unit.target: \include命令将第一个参数指定的文件的全部或部分发送到QDoc输入流中,作为QDoc注释片段进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The \ingroup command indicates that the given overview or documented class belongs to a certain group of related docmentation.
trans-unit.target: \ingroup命令表示给定的概述或文档类属于某个相关文档组。

trans-unit.source: The \ingroup command's argument is a group name, but note that the command considers the rest of the line as part of its argument. Make sure that the group name is followed by a linebreak.
trans-unit.target: \ingroup命令的参数是一个组名,但请注意,该命令将该行的其余部分作为其参数的一部分。确保组名后面有一个换行符。

trans-unit.source: The \inheaderfile meta-command is used for overriding the include statement generated for a C++ class, namespace, or header file reference documentation.

The \inherits command is for documenting that one QML type inherits some other QML type. It must be included in the inheriting element's \qmltype comment. The argument is the name of the inherited QML type.
trans-unit.target: \ inherits命令用于记录一种QML类型继承了另一种QML类型的情况。它必须包含在继承元素的\ qmltype注释中。参数是继承的QML类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The \inherits command is for documenting that one QML type inherits some other QML type. It must be included in the inheriting element's \qmltype comment. The argument is the name of the inherited QML type.
The \inlineimage command expands to the image specified by its argument. The image is rendered inline with the rest of the text.
trans-unit.target: inlineimage命令可以扩展到其参数所指定的图像。图片会与文本的其他部分连在一起。

trans-unit.source: The \inmodule command relates a class to the module specified by the command's argument.
trans-unit.target: inmodule命令将一个类与该命令参数所指定的模块相关联。

trans-unit.source: The \internal command indicates that the referenced function is not part of the public interface.
trans-unit.target: \internal命令表示被引用的函数不是公共接口的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The \keyword command is like the \target command, except when linking to keyword the link goes to the top of the QDoc comment where the \keyword appears in. If you want to create a link target to a section unit within a \page, use \target instead. A keyword can be linked from anywhere using a simple syntax.
trans-unit.target: \ keyword命令类似于\ target命令，除了链接到关键字时，链接会转到出现\ keyword的QDoc注释的顶部。如果要在\ page中创建指向 section 单元的链接目标，使用\ target代替。可以使用简单的语法从任何位置链接关键字。

trans-unit.source: The \keyword command is like the \target command, except when linking to keyword the link goes to the top of the QDoc comment where the \keyword appears in. If you want to create a link target to a section unit within a \page, use \target instead. A keyword can be linked from anywhere using a simple syntax.
The \keyword command names a place in the documentation that you can link to using the \l (link) and \sa (see also) commands.
trans-unit.target: \ keyword命令在文档中命名了一个位置，您可以使用\ l（链接）和\ sa（另请参见）命令链接到该位置。

trans-unit.source: The \keyword command names a place in the documentation that you can link to using the \l (link) and \sa (see also) commands.
The \l link command is used to create a hyperlink to many different kinds of targets. The command's general syntax is:
trans-unit.target: \l link命令用于创建一个超链接到许多不同类型的目标。该命令的一般语法是:

trans-unit.source: The \legalese and \endlegalese commands delimit a license agreement.
trans-unit.target: llegalese和endlegalese命令对许可协议进行限定。

trans-unit.source: The \li command marks a table cell or a list item. This command is only used in tables and lists.
trans-unit.target: \ li命令标记表格单元格或列表项。此命令仅在表和列表中使用。

trans-unit.source: The \li command marks a table cell or a list item. This command is only used in tables and lists.
The \list and \endlist commands delimit a list of items.
trans-unit.target: 列表和列表命令对一个项目列表进行定界。

trans-unit.source: The \list command takes an optional argument providing alternative appearances for the list items.
trans-unit.target: 列表命令需要一个可选的参数,为列表项提供其他的外观。

trans-unit.source: The \mapref command is for creating a mapref in the ditamap. A mapref refers to another ditamap, which you want to include in your ditamap. Like the \topicref command, the \mapref command has two arguments, but for the \mapref command, both arguments are required. The arguments are essentially the same as described for \topicref, but for \mapref, the second command must be the name of another ditamap, i.e. it must have the
trans-unit.target: mapref命令用于在ditamap中创建一个mapref。mapref指的是另一个ditamap,你想把它包含在你的ditamap中。和 \topicref 命令一样,\mapref 命令有两个参数,但是对于 \mapref 命令来说,两个参数都是必需的。参数基本上与描述的\topicref相同,但是对于\mapref,第二个命令必须是另一个ditamap的名称,也就是说,它必须具有以下特征

trans-unit.source: The \meta command combined with an argument installpath specifies the location of an installed example. This value overrides the one that is set using the examplesinstallpath configuration variable.
The \meta command is mainly used for including metadata in DITA XML files. It is also used for adding metadata to example documentation, and when generating HTML output for specifying the
trans-unit.target: meta命令主要用于在DITA XML文件中加入元数据。它也用于将元数据添加到示例文档中,以及在生成HTML输出时,为指定的

trans-unit.source: The \meta command is used for adding metadata to example documentation, and when generating HTML output for specifying the
The \newcode command and its companion the \oldcode command are a convenience combination of the \code commands: this combination provides a text relating the two code snippets to each other.
trans-unit.target: 所述\ newcode命令及其同伴的\ oldcode命令是的组合方便\代码命令：该组合提供了与所述两个代码段彼此文本。
